# Preface {.unnumbered}

This is a handbook on working with REDCap in R.

## Source

This book is a Quarto book written in Quarto (RStudio).

```{r include=FALSE}
# automatically create a bib database for R packages
knitr::write_bib(c(
  .packages(), 'knitr', 'rmarkdown', 'REDCapR', 'tidyverse', 'stRoke', "REDCapRITS","keyring", "REDCapTidieR"
), 'packages.bib')
```
